alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 26 at 3:33AM EST until November 29 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches possible, with the heaviest snow falling Monday night and Tuesday. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lake, Geauga, Ashtabula Inland and Ashtabula Lakeshore counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes, especially on Tuesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of light to moderate lake effect snow may lead to some travel impacts beginning Monday morning. The heaviest snow and most significant impacts are expected Monday night through Tuesday, when rates of 1-2" per hour can occur within snow bands.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
